publications.title: The Art of Suhas Roy: A Retrospective
publications.author: Dr. Alka Pande
publications.description: A comprehensive retrospective of Suhas Roy's artistic journey spanning over three decades, featuring critical essays and over 200 color plates of his most significant works.

publications.title: Contemporary Indian Art: New Directions
publications.author: Edited by Gayatri Sinha
publications.description: A landmark publication featuring Suhas Roy among other prominent contemporary Indian artists, exploring new trends and directions in Indian art in the 21st century.

publications.title: Spiritual Dimensions in Contemporary Art
publications.author: By Ranjit Hoskote
publications.description: An exploration of spirituality in contemporary Indian art, featuring a dedicated chapter on Suhas Roy's meditative works and their philosophical underpinnings.

publications.title: The Female Form in Indian Art
publications.author: By Geeta Kapur
publications.description: A scholarly examination of the representation of the female form in Indian art, with a section dedicated to Suhas Roy's iconic 'Radha' series.

publications.title: Masters of Indian Art: Volume III
publications.author: Edited by Yashodhara Dalmia
publications.description: The third volume in a series documenting the works of master Indian artists, featuring Suhas Roy alongside other contemporary masters.

news.title: Suhas Roy Receives National Award for Outstanding Contribution to Indian Art
news.excerpt: Renowned artist Suhas Roy was honored with the prestigious National Award for his outstanding contribution to Indian art at a ceremony held in New Delhi yesterday. The award recognizes his five decades of artistic excellence and influence on contemporary Indian art.

news.title: Suhas Roy's Works to be Featured in Major International Exhibition in Paris
news.excerpt: The Mus√©e d'Art Moderne de Paris has announced a major exhibition of contemporary Indian art, featuring a significant collection of works by Suhas Roy. The exhibition, titled 'Visions of India,' will open in September 2024 and run for three months.

news.title: Suhas Roy Opens New Studio and Gallery Space in Kolkata
news.excerpt: Artist Suhas Roy has inaugurated a new studio and gallery space in Kolkata's art district, designed to serve as both a working studio and a public exhibition space. The 5,000 square foot facility will also host workshops and artist residencies.

news.title: Record Price for Suhas Roy Painting at Sotheby's Auction
news.excerpt: A painting from Suhas Roy's 'Radha' series fetched a record price of $1.2 million at a Sotheby's auction in London, marking the highest price ever paid for the artist's work and signaling growing international recognition.

news.title: Suhas Roy to Lead Master Class Series at National Art School
news.excerpt: The National Art School has announced a series of master classes to be led by Suhas Roy, offering aspiring artists a rare opportunity to learn techniques and insights from one of India's most celebrated contemporary artists.

videos.title: Studio Visit: The Creative Process of Suhas Roy
videos.description: An intimate look into Suhas Roy's studio and creative process, featuring an interview about his inspirations, techniques, and artistic philosophy.

videos.title: Exhibition Opening: "Transcending Boundaries" at National Gallery
videos.description: Coverage of the opening night of Suhas Roy's major solo exhibition "Transcending Boundaries" at the National Gallery of Modern Art in New Delhi.

videos.title: Artist Talk: The Evolution of Indian Contemporary Art
videos.description: A lecture by Suhas Roy at the India International Centre discussing the evolution of contemporary Indian art and his place within this tradition.

videos.title: Documentary: The Life and Art of Suhas Roy
videos.description: A comprehensive documentary exploring the life, influences, and artistic journey of Suhas Roy, featuring interviews with art critics, collectors, and the artist himself.

videos.title: Technique Demonstration: Watercolor Mastery
videos.description: Suhas Roy demonstrates his renowned watercolor techniques, offering insights into his unique approach to this challenging medium.

videos.title: Interview with Suhas Roy: Inspirations and Influences
videos.description: An in-depth interview with Suhas Roy discussing his artistic inspirations, influences, and the evolution of his distinctive style over the decades.

photographs.title: Suhas Roy in His Studio, 2023
photographs.description: The artist at work in his Kolkata studio, captured by renowned photographer Raghu Rai.

photographs.title: Installation View, Jehangir Art Gallery, 2022
photographs.description: A view of Suhas Roy's solo exhibition at the prestigious Jehangir Art Gallery in Mumbai.

photographs.title: Portrait of the Artist, 2021
photographs.description: An intimate portrait of Suhas Roy by Padma Shri awardee Pablo Bartholomew.

photographs.title: Working on 'Spiritual Resonance' Series, 2023
photographs.description: The artist working on his acclaimed 'Spiritual Resonance' series in his studio.

photographs.title: With Collectors at India Art Fair, 2024
photographs.description: Suhas Roy discussing his work with collectors at the India Art Fair in New Delhi.

photographs.title: Early Career, Santiniketan, 1995
photographs.description: A rare photograph from the artist's early career at Santiniketan, where he studied under master artists.

photographs.title: Teaching Workshop, National Art School, 2022
photographs.description: Suhas Roy conducting a workshop for advanced students at the National Art School.

photographs.title: With Fellow Artists, Kochi-Muziris Biennale, 2023
photographs.description: Suhas Roy with fellow contemporary artists at the Kochi-Muziris Biennale.
